# The `BlockScalarNode` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A block scalar node is an opaque datum that can be presented as a series of zero or more Unicode scalar values. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A block scalar node is an opaque datum that can be presented as a series of zero or more Unicode scalar values.

Example: | Hello World

Definition at line 260 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/yamlparser-h">YAMLParser.h</a>.
